statements: SELECT * FROM soil_contamination_levels;
SELECT location, contamination_level FROM soil_contamination_levels ORDER BY sample_date DESC;
SELECT id, sample_date FROM soil_contamination_levels WHERE contamination_level > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM soil_contamination_levels WHERE sample_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT AVG(contamination_level) AS avg_level FROM soil_contamination_levels;
SELECT * FROM soil_contamination_levels WHERE contamination_level > 0.5 ORDER BY sample_date DESC
SELECT id, location FROM soil_contamination_levels WHERE sample_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM soil_contamination_levels WHERE location = ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint(10, 20), 4326)
SELECT id, contamination_level FROM soil_contamination_levels WHERE sample_date < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '1 month'
SELECT id, location, sample_date FROM soil_contamination_levels WHERE contamination_level IS NULL
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples;
SELECT sample_id, location FROM SoilSamples WHERE contamination_level < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples WHERE location = POINT(25.5, -34.2);
SELECT sample_id, contamination_level FROM SoilSamples ORDER BY contamination_level DESC;
SELECT AVG(contamination_level) AS avg_contamination FROM SoilSamples;
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples WHERE contamination_level > 0.5 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT sample_id, location FROM SoilSamples WHERE location IS NOT NULL
SELECT sample_id, ROUND(contamination_level, 2) AS rounded_contamination_level FROM SoilSamples ORDER BY rounded_contamination_level ASC
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples WHERE contamination_level BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8
SELECT AVG(contamination_level) AS average_contamination_level FROM SoilSamples
SELECT * FROM soil_samples;
SELECT sample_id, sample_location FROM soil_samples ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_date, analysis_result FROM soil_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM soil_mapping WHERE mapping_result = 'Contaminated' ORDER BY mapping_date DESC;
SELECT s.sample_id, s.sample_location, a.analysis_result FROM soil_samples s JOIN soil_analysis a ON s.sample_id = a.sample_id WHERE a.analysis_result = 'Positive';
SELECT * FROM soil_samples ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT sample_location, contamination_level FROM soil_samples WHERE contamination_level > 5;
SELECT s.sample_id, a.analysis_result, m.mapping_result FROM soil_samples s JOIN soil_analysis a ON s.sample_id = a.sample_id JOIN soil_mapping m ON a.analysis_id = m.analysis_id;
SELECT * FROM soil_analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;

SELECT s.sample_location, a.analysis_result, m.mapping_result FROM soil_samples s JOIN soil_analysis a ON s.sample_id = a.sample_id JOIN soil_mapping m ON a.analysis_id = m.analysis_id WHERE s.sample_location LIKE 'North%';
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM SamplingLocations WHERE latitude >= 40;
SELECT contaminant_name, safe_limit FROM Contaminants ORDER BY contaminant_name DESC;
SELECT sample_id, analysis_date, analysis_result FROM AnalysisResults WHERE analysis_result > 0.5;
SELECT s.sample_id, s.contamination_level, c.contaminant_name FROM SoilSamples s INNER JOIN Contaminants c ON s.contamination_level > c.safe_limit;
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples WHERE contamination_level > 0.5;
SELECT sample_id, location FROM SoilSamples WHERE ST_Y(location) > 50;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM SamplingLocations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT c.contaminant_name, c.safe_limit, ar.analysis_result FROM Contaminants c JOIN AnalysisResults ar ON c.contaminant_id = ar.contaminant_id;
SELECT s.sample_id, s.contamination_level, ar.analysis_result FROM SoilSamples s JOIN AnalysisResults ar ON s.sample_id = ar.sample_id WHERE s.contamination_level > 0.3;
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples;
SELECT sample_id, contamination_level FROM SoilSamples ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM SamplingSites WHERE site_id = 2;
SELECT contaminant_name, health_effect FROM Contaminants WHERE health_effect IS NOT NULL;
SELECT map_name, ST_AsText(coverage_area) FROM Maps ORDER BY map_id ASC;
SELECT sample_id, location_geometry, contamination_level FROM SoilSamples ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM SamplingSites WHERE site_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT contaminant_name, health_effect FROM Contaminants WHERE contaminant_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT result_id, sample_id, contaminant_id, concentration FROM AnalysisResults WHERE concentration > 10 ORDER BY result_id ASC;
SELECT map_name, ST_AsText(coverage_area) FROM Maps WHERE map_id < 5;
